resources.string:
"No bookmarks

Use the Edinburgh Bus Tracker app to add bookmarks first

"No bookmarks

Press the 'map' button above to view a map of stops.

From the map touch a stop on the map to display times, and then press menu to add a bookmark."

"Changes:
 * Fixes for Ice Cream Sandwich.
 * Filter out more invalid bus arrival times.
 * Increased server-side bus data updates to every day.
 Apologies for the recent missing stops fiasco: they'll be back as soon as the app auto-downloads the newest bus data update (or use Menu->Settings->Update bus data to do it manually). "
